subject: Beginner - Database Testing and Servlets
msgSnippet: Hi all We have simple/Complex Servlet-Database interactions in our current Project.Oracle 8i is the database being used. I have downloaded JUnit,httpUnit and
messageBody:
Hi all

We have simple/Complex Servlet-Database interactions in our current
Project.Oracle 8i is the database being used.
I have downloaded JUnit,httpUnit and Cactus.
Kindly provide information as to how to write testcases for Servlets
with Database

Thanks
Anand
